page.title: 20TRANSLATIONS (p. 9,10,16,17)
page.content: HARBOUR/LIFEBOAT (p. 9,10) Describes a visit to the lifeboat station drawing attention to the presence of yachts and birds in the Habrour and viewing Snowdon in the distance.In the station they met the engineer,Mr Owen Roberts, the Mayor of Pwllheli. {SCHOOLS(p. 16) Our school was opened {in 1978.367 children,16 teachers.Last {September -school uniform was adopted. {Ysgol Glan y Mor is the comprehensive {school on two sites.Soon it will be on {one site as the Junior Unit will be {moving down to join the Senior Unit {close to the sea. WELSH LEAGUE OF YOUTH (p.17) In 1982 Europe's largest Youth Festival was held at Pwllheli,the Welsh League of National Eisteddfod.Hundreds of children came here to compete. Every year the children partake in activities organised by the W.L.of Y.
